title: How to Forge a Frontier Style Tomahawk-Bruce Evans-ISO.ISO
description:
How to Forge a Frontier Style Tomahawk
Bruce Evans 
Video .ISO file


image link <a href="
http://smartflix.com/vidcaps/lvidcap_3664.jpg?1201971862" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://smartflix.com/vidcaps/lvidcap_3664.jpg?1201971862</a>


See bladesmith Bruce Evans as he demonstrates how to make a frontier style tomahawk. 
You will get to watch Bruce from the first blow of the hammer to the final oiling of the finished hawk.



Forging the tomahawk head from a round bar of steel 
Cleaning up the tomahawk head on the grinder
How to make your own hawk handle from a piece of wood
How to finish and dress up the tomahawk 

100 minutes
